metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20309 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in versions before 7.0.11 and before 6.9.12, where a division by zero in WaveImage() of MagickCore/visual-effects.c may trigger undefined behavior via a crafted image file submitted to an application using ImageMagick. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

notes.Note: rayveldkamp> imagemagick is in universe from focal onwards

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
